		Question: Which sold more books, Harry Potter or Lord of the Rings?
		Answer:
answer:
The answer is: Harry Potter. 

According to the website Guinness World Records, Harry Potter has sold over 450 million copies worldwide, while The Lord of the Rings has sold around 150 million copies worldwide.
